title: Lauren Goodger PICTURE EXCLUSIVE: Ex-TOWIE star shows off her incredible curves in TINY neon bikini
text:
She is no stranger to showing off her curves on social media.

So naturally, Lauren Goodger was keen to display her sizzling physique elsewhere as she soaked up the sun during a recent trip to Marbella.

The former TOWIE star, 33, struggled to contain her surgically-enhanced assets as she reclined by the pool in the tiny two-piece while preening and pouting.

Hot stuff: Lauren Goodger was keen to display her sizzling physique as she soaked up the sun during a recent trip to Marbella

Lauren was showing off every inch of her frame as she twisted this way and that to best exhibit every bit of her incredible curves.

Her peachy posterior was highlighted by the scanty material on the thong bottoms, while her cleavage was enhanced with underwired cups.

She let her brunette locks tumble down her back in loose lengths while masking her face from the sunshine with huge sunglasses.

In a nod to her Essex girl origins, she was showing off an envy-inducing gold Rolex watch which added an even more eye-popping touch to the look.

Oh my... The former TOWIE star, 33, struggled to contain her surgically-enhanced assets as she reclined by the pool in the tiny two-piece while preening and pouting

Check me out! Her peachy posterior was highlighted by the scanty material on the thong bottoms, while her cleavage was enhanced with underwired cups

Uh oh: With her curves causing such a stir, it is little wonder fan have raised the question about surgical enhancement - however she has always defiantly insisted her derriere is all natural

Taut: Her taut stomach was as impressive as her eye-popping cleavage and perky derriere

With her curves causing such a stir, it is little wonder fan have raised the question about surgical enhancements - however she has always defiantly insisted her derriere is all natural.

Lauren's holiday comes amid claims she feels 'betrayed and upset' after her close pal Yazmin Oukhellou dated her jailbird ex Jake McLean.

The reality star has reportedly been putting on a 'brave face' since discovering their short-lived romance through 'word of mouth' instead of through the duo themselves.

According to reports, Lauren, who dated Jake for four years between 2012 and 2016, has been telling pals she can't see how she can be friends with Yazmin again, especially after she confided in her about Jake during a girls' holiday in July.

This old thing? Lauren certainly seemed proud of her hard-worked posterior

Uh oh: Unfortunately in the midst of her sunbathing she suffered tan lines beneath her derriere

Green with envy: She let her brunette locks tumble down her back in loose lengths while masking her face from the sunshine with huge sunglasses

Hot stuff: The tiny bottoms were working overtime to protect Lauren's modesty

A source told Closer: 'Yaz was someone she opened up to about Jake, so for her to go behind her back and date him, knowing how upset that would make Lauren, feels like a low blow.

'She doesn't want to have a big showdown with Yaz, but she's told pals she can't see how they can be friends again. She's heartbroken.

'Yaz knew how Lauren felt about Jake because she opened up to her about their on-off romance during the girls' holiday in July,' they added: 'Lauren felt like she was a great friend to her and they were really close.'

Who? Me? She was certainly camera ready as she posed in style to display her derriere

Baby got back! She paired the bold ensemble with a simple pair of black flip flops to ensure her body did all the talking

Betrayal: Lauren's holiday comes amid claims she feels 'betrayed and upset' after her close pal Yazmin Oukhellou (pictured last month) dated her jailbird ex Jake McLean

Heartache: Lauren dated Jake for four years between 2012 and 2016 (Lauren and Jake pictured in 2013)

They added that Lauren wanted to 'feel positive about dating' but is now 'scared to open up'.

While a different source told New!: 'Everyone knew Lauren still had feelings for Jake - including Yaz, seeing your ex with someone else is hard, let alone when they're meant to be one of your best friends. It's doubly heartbreaking.

'She has found it all so hard and is so upset. She was with Jake for four years and he was the love of her life. She feels betrayed and hurt.

'Lauren doesn't let many friends in and she let Yaz in and now she has done this. It's been a tough few weeks for her and her anxiety and stress shave been through the roof.'

Hot stuff: She was keen to showcase all her best bits as she kicked back by the pool
description: The former TOWIE star, 33, struggled to contain her surgically-enhanced assets as she reclined by the pool in the tiny two-piece while preening and pouting
